name: Ele-mental artist
description:
A game about painting tiles, but the colors have negative effects on you.

Made for Mini Jam 101. The theme was "Colors²" and the limitation was "You are your own enemy".

Source code :
https://dario-zubovic.github.io/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=5c45c0183f5fe78623...

Gist used :
